project_description: Argu machinaries is a manufecturer company website. where the compnay sell different types of Agriculturer Tools and Machinaries. In this Website we use the Teachlogy for Frontent is React Js, Tailwidn Css. For user Authentication use React Firebase and Firebase hooks. React Router 6 is used for routing different path. For backend technology we use Node js, Express Js and Mongodb databse. Make rest api for use the data. All rest api is secure usign JWT web token. International Payment getway Stripe is Used Here. And Implement lots of feautre for user intarective.
